name: Robothorium: Sci-fi Dungeon Crawler
description: Robothorium is a cyberpunk dungeon crawler with turn-based fights, where all your choices will have a direct impact on your revolution against Humankind. Deep Strategy, Crafting, Party Based management, Talents and so much more in this roguelike!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 440 or AMD Radeon HD 5550 w/ 512 MB Storage: 1250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 10 compliant graphics card Storage: 2 GB available space
